name: FogClaw
description: PII detection & custom entity redaction powered by DataFog

enabled.label: Enable FogClaw
enabled.help: Enable or disable the plugin without uninstalling it.

guardrail_mode.label: Guardrail Mode
guardrail_mode.help: Default action for detections: redact, block, or warn.

redactStrategy.label: Redaction Strategy
redactStrategy.help: How sensitive values are replaced in message context before the agent sees them.

model.label: GLiNER Model
model.help: Model used for zero-shot detection (defaults to onnx-community/gliner_large-v2.1).

confidence_threshold.label: Confidence Threshold
confidence_threshold.help: Minimum GLiNER score (0-1) required before an entity is treated as a detection.

custom_entities.label: Custom Entity Labels
custom_entities.help: Extra labels to detect as sensitive entities (for example: `project code`, `competitor name`).

entityActions.label: Entity Actions
entityActions.help: Map specific entity labels to per-entity behavior (for example: {"EMAIL": "block", "PHONE": "redact"}).
